```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import plotnine as p9
df_2010 = pd.read_csv("/Users/pinoliara/Downloads/GSB_544/Week_1/Data/q1data.csv")
df_1997 = pd.read_csv("/Users/pinoliara/Downloads/GSB_544/Week_1/Data/q2data.csv")
df_2001 = pd.read_csv("/Users/pinoliara/Downloads/GSB_544/Week_1/Data/q3data.csv")

(p9.ggplot(df_2010,
p9.aes(
  x = "income",
  y = "life_exp",
  size = "population",
  color = "four_regions"
))
+ p9.geom_point()
+ p9.scale_x_log10(breaks=[500, 1000, 2000, 4000, 8000, 16000, 32000, 64000], labels=['500', '1000', '2000', '4000', '8000', '16k', '32k', '64k'], limits=[0,128000])
+ p9.scale_y_continuous(limits=(20, 90), breaks=range(20, 91, 10))
+ p9.scale_color_manual({"americas": "#7ED321", "africa": "#2DC5F4", "europe": "#F8E71C", "asia": "#FF6F8C"})
+ p9.scale_size_continuous(range=(0.5, 20))
+ p9.annotate("text", x=1000, y=90, label="INCOME LEVEL 1", ha="center")
+ p9.annotate("text", x=4500, y=90, label="LEVEL 2", ha="center")  
+ p9.annotate("text", x=18000, y=90, label="LEVEL 3", ha="center")
+ p9.annotate("text", x=50000, y=90, label="LEVEL 4", ha="center")
+ p9.labs(
       x = "Income",
       y = "Life expectancy")
+ p9.theme_minimal()
+ p9.theme(legend_position="none")
+ p9.theme(figure_size=(12,6))
)
```
